// Welcome to my site

I'm Adrian, a frontend developer.

Since June 2020 I'm an IT engineer.

Programming became my passion few years ago.

// My tools

What I'm using everyday

Initaly, I was making websites only with plain JS, to laid proper fundation for my further developement. After many months of intense learning, I decided to move onto framework. I choosed React over Angular (In which I made my engineer project), because I decided that functional programming is my way to go.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • SASS
  • JavaScript
  • React & Redux
  • npm
  • Firebase
  • git
  • Axios

What I used in the past

During my frontend journey, and before it, I had contact with many technologies and frameworks. Some of them I know more (like SQL) than others. If I needed to, refreshing knowledge about them wouldn't be a problem.

  • Java
  • Hibernate
  • SQL
  • AWS
  • Angular
  • TypeScript
  • Jenkins
  • Jasmine
  • Ionic & Cordova

// My projects

Forex Alerts

Project designed for internal use in a trading group. Major features include alerts for Forex pairs using Free Forex API, trade journaling, individual trader and whole group statistics. Made with my friend Krystian.
